issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Validate XMLs if a relevant tool is available, when using scripts

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: HADOOP-7947 introduced new hadoop subcommand conftest, but it is not documented yet.

This message was automatically generated.

HADOOP-12071 patch 002
* patch applies to trunk
* quick review of ConfTest itself, with IDE suggested/applied cleanup

I looked at what it'd take to add XInclude support (as it fails right now), but concluded it'd take work. I just documented. 

If we really wanted to improve conftest I'd go for XSD/RelaxNG validation followed by reading the DOM and checking that way.

| (x) *{color:red}-1 overall{color}* |
